item.description:
求助英语大佬，帮看下向美国教授要邀请函的邮件 Dear Prof. ,
Thank you for your reply. I would like to introduce more detail about the scholarship of China Scholarship Council (CSC).
The Chinese government set up this scholarship to encourage Chinese student to study and do research in the world top-class universities. This scholarship will cover student’s living cost but not including the tuition. The applicant should obtain formal admission or invitation letter and tuition fee waiver from a foreign university by the time of application.
If possible, I sincerely want to obtain an invitation letter from you and I’ll very appreciate for that. Please don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any question. According to the proposition of CSC, the invitation letter should contain the following items.
a. Use special letter paper of host institution
b. Contain basic information of applicant, such as name, birth date and domestic institution
c. Indicate the station of applicant in host institution. (Visiting Ph. D student)
d. Indicate the duration of being a visiting student
e. Indicate the study topic and host supervisor
f. Indicate tuition of study (Visiting student should be free of tuition)
g. Indicate the work and study language. English level of applicant meeting demands of Ph.D. study
h. Corresponding address and signature of the host supervisor
I’m sorry to disturb you so much and thank you again for your kindness.
Best wishes.
Yours sincerely,
----------------------------分割线----------------------
这个语气可以吗？如果有什么毛病请一定指出来啊
之前我超级想去的新西兰的教授，不知道为什么失联了
可能是我回复的邮件写得不好吧
求大佬帮助啊

Dear Prof. xxxx ,
Thank you for your reply. I would like to have an invitation letter from you since China Scholarship Council (CSC) requires a formal invitation letter and tuition fee waiver from a foreign university by the time of application. (tell him/her what you want first, and why. )
The scholarship of CSC covers the living costs but not including the tuition fees. (really wondering why the professor would care about what is CSC, what they do, and what get paid. )
According to the requirements of CSC, the invitation letter should include following information,
a.      special letter paper of host institution (I guess you mean "paper with official title of the institution ?")
b.      basic information of the applicant, such as name, birth date and domestic institution (so i guess you have provided the info. domestic institution? the one you are attending in China？)
c.      station of applicant in host institution. (Visiting Ph. D student) （ station of applicant ？ station? not status or position?)
d.      Duration of the visit
e.      The study topic and name of the supervisor
f.      Tuition of study (tuition waiver? )
g.      The language (English) of the study, and the statement indicates that the applicant meets the language proficiency requirement of Ph.D. study.
h.      Address and signature of the supervisor
Thank you for your time.
Please let me know if you have any questions.(not "any question")
Yours sincerely,
xxxx

东非大裂谷:
问题不算太大，小地方注意一下：
1. 注意定冠词，名词的话要么用a/an，要么the，要么变复数，比如chinese student这里，你要用students；
2. This scholarship will cover student’s living cost but not including the tuition这句话感觉比较……别扭。如果是我的会写成“The scholarship covers the student's living expenses. Tuition, however, is not covered."
3. Do NOT use contractions in formal writing. 正式信件中不要使用缩略语，什么R（are），U（you）这类的短信式先不说，Please don’t hesitate这样的也是不妥的。
If possible, I sincerely want to obtain an invitation letter from you and I’ll very appreciate for that. Please don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any question. According to the proposition of CSC, the invitation letter should contain the following items.
这一段是不怎么礼貌，而且放在这里也是比较违和的。如果是我的话会把这段打头（因为这才是你的email的主要目的），变成这样：
Dear Prof. XXX,
Thank you for your reply. I would like to obtain an invitation letter from you. I was applying for the scholarship of China Scholarship Council (CSC), which covers my living expenses during the study. （这里你甚至不需要提学费，因为反正不cover，和这个教授也没关系，你只需要让教授知道这个奖学金cover啥就足够了。同理中国政府为什么设置奖学金也没必要说。）In order to complete the application,I was need to obtain an invitation letter with the following information:
你要的东西列表先不说；(不清楚这都是啥，比如第一个就不明所以，啥叫Use special letter paper）
I appreciate your help. （这就够了） If you need any clarification, please let me know. （你的教授如果想联系你是绝对不会hesitate的……而且contact me if you have any question更像是研究生TA对问问题本科生的对话）
Sincerely
XXX
